messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Need Help! Children are confused and hurt by unsuppo...
messages.msgSnippet: I certainly agree. I am trying to visualize the happiness this change could bring forth for all of us. I alao feel this would really bring all of us even
messages.messageBody:
I certainly agree. I am trying to visualize the happiness this change could bring forth for all of us. I alao feel this would really bring all of us even closer as a family. It will be an incredible experience and adventure for us to share as a family.~Annie~~You may laugh at me because I am different. I laugh at you because you are all the same.~~--- On Tue 04/15, < grlynbl@... > wrote:From: [mailto: grlynbl@...]To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.comDate: Tue, 15 Apr 2003 19:21:04 EDTSubject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Need Help! Children are confused and hurt by unsuppo...In a message dated 4/15/03 5:36:48 PM Eastern Daylight Time, sorcha-aisling@... writes:> But then I would feel like I was running awayDont think of it as running away from something "bad" as much as running toward something much much better. If your girls do not want to be involved in thier fathers life ( and I suspect, if they do, its only out of guilt and obligation, considering the way he is treating them).. Then RUN as fast as you can.. straight toward peace and productivity.Teresa[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Need Help! Children are confused and hurt by unsuppo...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/15/03 5:36:48 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Dont think of it as running away from something bad as much as running toward something much
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/15/03 5:36:48 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
sorcha-aisling@... writes:

> But then I would feel like I was running away

Dont think of it as running away from something "bad" as much as running
toward something much much better. If your girls do not want to be involved
in thier fathers life ( and I suspect, if they do, its only out of guilt and
obligation, considering the way he is treating them).. Then RUN as fast as
you can.. straight toward peace and productivity.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
